headline: From AI Darlings To Dow Dinosaurs: Investors Flee Software For Old-Economy Stocks
summary: Software stocks are sliding as AI disruption fears grow, but investors aren't panicking. Goldman Sachs shows capital rotating toward AI-insulated, real-economy sectors.

raw.headline: From AI Darlings To Dow Dinosaurs: Investors Flee Software For Old-Economy Stocks

headline: Jim Cramer Recommends FedEx and United Over SkyWest
summary: SkyWest, Inc. (NASDAQ:SKYW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer commented on. When a caller asked for Cramer’s opinion on the stock, he replied, “I buy United, and I buy FedEx, and you get them both.” SkyWest, Inc. (NASDAQ:SKYW) runs a regional airline that provides scheduled passenger and freight flights, along with on-demand charter and […]
